name: boom.fun
description: Boom.fun is an Ethereum-native launchpad and decentralized exchange (DEX) engineered to capture the $150 M+ per-month memecoin trading craze while turning every new coin into rocket fuel for the $BOOM token. By pairing all launches with $BOOM, streaming launches live, and unleashing an AI meme-hunter that ships fresh tokens daily, Boom.fun is positioned to outpace—and ultimately out-earn—the Solana phenomenon Pump.fun. Additionally, devs can set a tax on their coins to sustain the project from volume fees instead of token sales & can opt into our “Safe Badge”, with buys being automatically vested over time to prevent early buyers from dumping.
